name: Kosher Coleslaw (Health Salad)
description: Adapted from the Claremont Diner in New Jersey [Flickr: La Grande Farmers' Market]...
recipeIngredient: 2 cups of shredded cabbage, radicchio, and carrots
4 to 5 tablespoons of apple cider vinegar
1 to 2 tablespoons of a neutral –tasting oil, like canola

recipeInstructions.text: Create an emulsion of the vinegar and the oil, blending thoroughly. Add sugar if desired. Salt to taste.
Marinate shredded vegetables in the mixture. Chill until quite cold (approximately 2 hours). Add additional oil or vinegar if desired.
